objects.text:
A perfect blend of style & comfort,
like its namesake Spanish coffee

• Ever-soft and ever-snug grip
• Roomy toe box for comfort
• 3-layered SpaceWalk sole system
• Zero slip, max abrasion resistance

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
This banner highlights a lifestyle sneaker with a minimal, coffee-themed design. The composition is divided into quadrants with soft, warm-toned background blocks and intersecting diagonal lines for subtle visual interest. The top-left quadrant contains a bold title text ("heading") and a brand/model name ("subheading"), followed by a tagline ("tagline") that emphasizes comfort and style. A large product image ("product_image") dominates the top-right, while the bottom-left provides key product features in a bulleted list ("description"), pricing info ("price"), and a standout call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta"). The bottom-right features a large decorative star graphic ("decorative") for visual balance.

**Color Palette**:
- Cream (#F5F2E9)
- Soft Beige (#F8F5F0, #EDE5D7)
- Warm Mocha (#8B5A2B)
- Dark Chocolate (#5D4037, #3A2618)
- Muted Taupe (#D9C3AB, #E8D8C5)
product_color: The product image features a stylish sneaker that combines a minimalist and earthy color palette. The primary color is an off-white cream (#F5F0E5) used throughout the shoe’s upper, creating a clean and neutral backdrop. Accents like the shoelaces and outsole tread incorporate a rich mocha brown (#6F4E37), giving warmth and visual grounding to the design. A soft beige midsole (#E8DDCD) adds subtle contrast while keeping the tone elegant. The signature logo is outlined with the same mocha brown and filled with crisp white (#FFFFFF), drawing attention without clashing. These colors are blended harmoniously, with edges and trim offering bold yet smooth highlights.
